imdb_user_reviews.contents: There'd better be some Oscar nominations coming for this little gem.

A long meandering tale that goes absolutely nowhere.
I LIVED it. Reality of life in the hills

hey if the last film you saw was a sequel, you might not like 'Winter's bone'
